attributes.action: utterly repudiate the petition asking for Section 28 to be reinstated and to stop the promotion of homosexuality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I acknowledge that there are already quite a few petitions expressing the opposing view to the one I wish to have repudiated.  None, however, deals specifically with Section 28 or, especially, with the issue of "promotion" of homosexuality.  My view (as a heterosexual woman) is that homosexuality almost NEEDS to be promoted in order to counteract the all-pervasive, and completely taken for granted, (so much so that you don't even notice it or realise that it's happening) promotion of HETEROSEXUALITY!
